trans-unit.source: Passed to the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext)" /> method to enable the modification of a service contract and its context prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Passado para o método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext)" /> para habilitar a modificação de um contrato de serviço e seu contexto antes de gerar código.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> objeto passado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método de modificar o modelo de objeto de documento de código antes da geração de código.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface é implementada em um personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementação que é usada para importar elementos WSDL personalizados ou modificar o código no nível de serviço ou operação.

trans-unit.source: To modify the code at the operation level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar o código no nível da operação, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> objeto passado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para adicionar comentários de código extraídos de elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra os comentários de código resultante.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O gerador que gera o código para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para o código de contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> usando o gerador de contrato especificado, a descrição do contrato e a declaração de tipo de código do contrato.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O gerador que gera o código para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para o código de contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para o código de contrato duplex a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> usando o gerador de contrato especificado, a descrição do contrato e a declaração de tipo de código do contrato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> do contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> property to examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> propriedade para examinar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=nameWithType> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> do contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ContractType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the current contract before the code is generated.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ContractType%2A> propriedade para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> para o contrato atual antes do código é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> objeto passado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para adicionar comentários de código extraídos de elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra os comentários de código resultante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> do contrato do retorno de chamada duplex no contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para o contrato de retorno de chamada dúplex no contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.DuplexCallbackType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.DuplexCallbackType%2A> propriedade para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> para o contrato de retorno de chamada dúplex no contrato de serviço antes de gerar código.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> que representam as operações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> objetos que representam as operações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Operations%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Operations%2A> propriedade para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> objetos que representam as operações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> que deverá gerar o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> que é gerar o contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> property to examine or modify the code generator that is to create the contract code.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> propriedade para examinar ou modificar o gerador de código é criar o código de contrato.
